Question
========

Below is the ANOVA table associated with a Randomized Complete Block-ANOVA on an experiment into the possible effect of a number of treatments.

  -------------- ----- ---- ---- ------ Source of variation SS df MS F Treatment 120 3 40 1.14 Block 90 2 45 1.29 Error 210 6 35 Total 420 11 -------------- ----- ---- ---- ------

If we had ignored the blocks, and applied a Completely Randomized Design ANOVA, how large would the mean residual squared MS(Error) would have been?

Answerlist
----------

* 35
* 37.5
* 38.2
* 40

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 35: Incorrect
* 37.5: Correct
* 38.2: Incorrect
* 40: Incorrect
